task: Turn on Sink faucet and put toilet paper in the trash
verify_ground_truth: Check if at least one Faucet is ON and a GarbageCan contains at least one ToiletPaper.

task: Place the Bar of soap in the sink first and then place dishsponge in the sink
verify_ground_truth: Check if the Sink contains the SoapBar and the ScrubBrush.
Check if the BathTub Faucet is ON(Toggled). Or the BathTub is filled with water.
